mapper.insert: insert into comment (post_id, member_id, writing_date, last_edit_date, comment_content) values (#{postId}, #{memberId}, now(), now(), #{commentContent})
mapper.update: update comment set comment_content = #{commentEditDto.commentContent}, last_edit_date = now() + 0.00001 where comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.select: select comment_id, post_id, member_id, writing_date, last_edit_date, comment_Content from comment
